A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Enghh. A lot of subplots left open in this one that just made things disappointing. This movie could have been condensed as well\, a tad long. Too much going on too quickly but Mark Hamill was great and probably the saving grace for this film. They need better script writers at this point. I mean it wasn't terrible and a few moments did shine but overall they can do better than this.
